definition: original position/(in) the same place/normal position/the place where one currently is/in situ
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: Using in situ end labelling, the authors demonstrated for the first time that this change belonged to apoptosis.
sentences.chinese: 經原位末端標記，首次證明本病的這種病變屬於凋亡。

sentences.english: Objective The in situ hybridization method was used with signal amplification system for detecting G-protein expression in taste buds.
sentences.chinese: 目的利用原位雜交檢測味細胞中G蛋白的表達。

sentences.english: In situ observation of TEM indicates that bainite nucleate by shear in solute atom's depleted regions.
sentences.chinese: 原位觀察證實貝氏體於溶質原子貧化區切變形核。

sentences.english: Objective To study advantages or disadvantages of total cystectomy and W shape orthotopic ileal neobladder.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討膀胱全切原位W形迴腸代膀胱術優缺點。

sentences.english: Myocardial apoptosis was detected with in situ end labeling and DNA ladder.
sentences.chinese: 原位末端標記法和DNA凝膠電泳檢測心肌細胞凋亡。

sentences.english: We found everything to be in place when we entered the room.
sentences.chinese: 我們走進房時發現一切都在原位。

sentences.english: The main problem is that Sagittarius does not like remaining on one place and aspires to independence.
sentences.chinese: 主要的問題在於，射手不喜歡留守原位，並渴望獨立。

sentences.english: Micro-cracks of rocks is closely related to in situ velocity variation.
sentences.chinese: 岩石微裂隙與主孔原位波速變化有密切關係。

sentences.english: Glove torn skin should be restored to thick split skin and be sutured;
sentences.chinese: 套狀撕脫皮膚可修復成中厚皮片行原位縫合。

sentences.english: Replace the tendons, repair the tendon sheaths and retinacula, and close the incision.
sentences.chinese: 將肌腱回覆原位，修補腱鞘及支持帶，然後關閉切口。

sentences.english: The patient treated for carcinoma in situ of the cervix must receive adequate follow-up.
sentences.chinese: 曾接受子宮頸原位癌治療的患者必須接受足夠的隨診。

sentences.english: The apoptosis in situ was measured by the nicking end labeling.
sentences.chinese: 凋亡原位檢測採用缺口末端標記法。

sentences.english: The spectral reflectance before and after irradiations of electrons was insitu measured.
sentences.chinese: 採用原位測量的手段記錄了輻照前後的光譜反射係數。

sentences.english: Please put the receiver back after calling.
sentences.chinese: 打完電話後，請把聽筒放回原位。

sentences.english: Hear here, Long Qi brings up of heart this just re- falls to return to family location.
sentences.chinese: 聽到這裏，龍琦提起的心這才重新落回了原位。

sentences.english: In this study, in-situ reaction technologies were used.
sentences.chinese: 在本論文研究中，使用了原位反應複合技術。

definition: original spot/previous place/where it was before
to put sth back where it belongs/to return to the original position/to return to one's seat (in a classroom)
to sit properly/to sit up straight
to restore sb or sth to its original position/to regain the throne/to reset (a dislocated joint, an electronic device etc)/reset
(in) the original place/the place where one currently is/place of origin/local (product)
to roll/to turn over/to invert/to flip
